website_summaries.verdict: A quality alternative to suction cups and tools if you find those devices intimidating.
pros: We liked that we could just stick this mask on and relax while waiting for results
There was no fear of bruising or red lines left behind
This will leave your lips noticeably bigger and softer
We also like the added anti aging benefits that this product promises
cons: Treatment time takes longer with the mask than it does with the other devices – 40 minutes to 1 hour

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea of this product
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this product. So far I've only used it once. I plan to use the rest of the items in this order. A big issue was that there was not a single piece of instruction for use with respect to how long to keep the product on, how often it can be used, or ingredients. For these reasons I couldn't give more than 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mimzy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: These little beauties really do the job!! Comfortable to have on. Makes the fine lines and wrinkles around your mouth less visible so you do get that lip plumping look but not to extreme, very natural. Your lips and surrounding skin feels like silk. The longer you can wear, the better the outcome. Very impressed and will order again!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bower

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: These work great ... and, can be used multiple times before it starts to dry out ... (just seal it in a baggy and put in the fridge between uses) ....
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Rose

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Waste Your Money on These 🙄
customer_reviews.text: Absolute waste of money. Once you finally cut them out of their packaging, they’re thin, dry and useless. Better off to try the 30 pair of eye patches & trim a few for any upper lip and “11” lines. $6 doesn’t seem like much, but better spent elsewhere. Just don’t!
customer_reviews.author: laura radford

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It really helps moisturize your lips. Makes them fuller when you have small lips. Definitely try this product.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Adams

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on these.
customer_reviews.text: These things were a waste of money, I've used them twice and it feels like nothing, does not leave my lips moisturized. I've used other products similar to these and they worked way better. I would not reccomend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Silva

customer_reviews.title: Does no visual change
customer_reviews.text: It makes no improvements to your appearance or dryness. Smells weird and it doesn’t stay on your face
customer_reviews.author: britty

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with no instructions. Cut open the packaging and no mask to apply, just liquid that runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: No instructions,  no ingredients, no box (package).
customer_reviews.text: I received 5 lip mask wrapped in a rubber band with no instructions or ingredients. So disappointed and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: I just didn't like how it didn't cover my whole mouth
customer_reviews.text: It worked well, I just didn't like how it didn't cover my whole mouth. I kept having to push it up to get the full coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Would not order again. Saw no improvement not even a little
customer_reviews.author: Darlene `

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy these!
customer_reviews.text: If I couldn’t leave 1 star I would. These arrived just thrown in a box, no instructions and with an expiration date that was 5 days from when I received them. I returned them and would not recommend buying these at all!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: I honestly tried this and after 30 minutes my lips look super healthy and plump
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking accutane for my acne and as a result it ends up with really dry and cracked lips. I honestly tried this and after 30 minutes my lips look super healthy and plump. I was looking for other options and found that while this was a really good product I found another place that sold 30 for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Aiso

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Softening Experience!
customer_reviews.text: I really like how soft my lips feel after I wear these! I noticed some fullness too!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Elena Watts

customer_reviews.title: Thin
customer_reviews.text: Hard to keep straight to put on lips. Cheap so no big deal,I am sure something good came of it.
customer_reviews.author: janetbyrum

customer_reviews.title: Results when used overnight
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this mask, I left it on for the 15 minutes or so per the instructions. I noticed that my lips appeared to be fuller, they were softer and looked moisturized. The second time, I left the mask on overnight. I should say I left it on for however long it stuck. In the morning, my lips were definitely plumper. This effect lasted about 2 days. I waited a week to do this again. The top photo was taken 8/14, the bottom 8/15 after using the mask overnight. My normal lips are very dry. I'll definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: S

product_meta.title: 5 Masks 24K Gold Collagen Lip Treatment Mask Patches. Plumper Fuller Softer Lips. Anti Aging Reduce Fine Line Wrinkles Creases Hydrating Moisturizing Uplifting Tone Firmer Smooth Lips Regeneration.
product_meta.description: About the product TREATMENT FEATURES: Creates Full-Lip Appearance Reduces Fine Lines, Wrinkles and Creases Hydrates & Softens Firms Skin Above & Below Lip Area Treats Dry & Chapped Lips Moisturizes Above & Below Lips Reducing Signs of Aging Rejuvenates the Lips Gold Intensive Care Collagen Lip Mask - Cell Renewal & Lip Volumizer. The nano-gold particles in the Gold Collagen Lip Mask penetrate the dermis rejuvenating collagen deep into the skin which activates cell renewal, eliminates toxins, moisturizes above & below lips reducing signs of aging, adds volume to your lips giving a fuller plumper look. At the same time the nano-gold particles enhance firmness & elasticity, and reduces the fine lines, wrinkles and crow's-feet around the lips. See Results in 2 - 3 Treatments! INGREDIENTS: Water (Agua), Phyto-collagen, Glycerin, Niacinamide (Vitamin B3), Hyaluronic acid, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Colloidal Minerals, Sodium PCA, Nano Gold Particals, Aloe Extract, Natural Moisturizing Factor, Tocopheryl Accetate (Vitamin E), Palmitoyl Dipeptide-7 Elastin，Alcloxa，Tartaric Acid，Acetyl Tyrosine
feature_bullets: Treats Dry & Chapped Lips Moisturizes Above & Below Lips Reducing Signs of Aging
Reduces Fine Lines, Wrinkles and Creases
Firms Skin Above & Below Lip Area
